vcf to snp for fasta
## The command is a Cheetah template which allows some Python based syntax. ## Lines starting hash hash are comments. Galaxy will turn newlines into spaces ## ! We only have a simple single command here.
vcf_snp.py -s ${vcf} -o output.txt; echo ${vcf.name} > name.txt; cut -f2 output.txt >seq.txt; paste name.txt seq.txt> output2.txt
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Transforms a vcf into a snp tab file. Has to take the nucleotide from the reference column when identical.
